name: May 2025 Criminal Indictment. Hack Club UwU Party v. Ryan, Lucas
May 2025 L87 v. QuizzityMC
verdict: [The court] finds in the defendant's favor... Case dissmised with prejudice (this case cannot be refiled for the reasons of this suit, unless the defendant moves foward with the threats or makes further threats)

name: April 2025 Class Action led by ayo v. Thomas
verdict: This court is of the opinion that Thomas should have changed his pfp if he did state he would at 100. However this court has no jurisdiction here. Motion for dismissal accepted

name: April 2025 HCRP v. astra.celestine [&] L87
verdict: Case dismissed because you can't sue for these kinds of crimes

name: March 2025 afonso v. Game-chan
verdict: Case dismissed. [The court does not] see anything wrong here, it was clearly a joke and [the court is] not punishing someone for making a joke
